text: The Gerald R. Ford Presidential Museum is the presidential library to honor and remember President of the United States Gerald R. Ford. It is also the final resting place of him and his wife Betty. The library was started in 1982. It is in Grand Rapids, Michigan. ==Other websites== * Gerald R. Ford Presidential Library and Museum Ford Category:Buildings and structures in Michigan Category:Gerald Ford Category:Grand Rapids, Michigan Category:1982 establishments in the United States Category:1980s establishments in Michigan
title: Gerald R. Ford Presidential Museum
